testcase.name: Given Pet store creating new pet data
When I create a new pet by providing the information id "67" idFirst "34" name "Lio" nameFirst "Dog" photoUrl"http://dummyimage.com"idsecond "11" namesecond "Pugsy" status"available"
Then I verify A pet with "67" is created
And I update the pet information id "67" idFirst "34" name "Lio" nameFirst "Dog" photoUrl"http://dummyimage.com"idsecond "11" namesecond "Pugsy" status"available"
And A pet update with "67" is successfully
And I delete the pet that created with "67"
Then the pet deleted succesfully from the application
| 67 | 34 | Lio | Dog | http://dummyimage.com | 11 | Pugsy | available |

testcase.name: Given Pet store Application running
When I create new user by providing the information id "01" username "abc01" firstName"abc" lastName "cba" email "abc01@gmail.com" password"abc123" phone "02103245683"userStatus "1"
Then I get that created user with "abc01" is created
And I update the user with information id "01" username "abc01" firstName"abc" lastName "cba" email "abc01@gmail.com" password"abc123" phone "02103245683"userStatus "1"
And I verify user updated with "abc01" successfully
And I delete created user with username "abc01"
Then The user deleted successfully
| 01 | abc01 | abc | cba | abc01@gmail.com | abc123 | 02103245683 | 1 |
